# roundedMarkers

**Instance Property**

If 1, then the Finder Patterns in the QRCode should have a rounded appearance. If 2, then the Alignment Patterns will also be rounded

## Declaration

```swift
var roundedMarkers: Int { get set }
```
title: roundedMarkers
